page.title: 03ALTON TOWERS
page.content: Hello, my name is Sarah. On Sunday my family and I went to Alton Towers. Alton Towers is a recreation park in Staffordshire. It was fantastic. First of all we went on the cable cars. These hang from a cable about 80 feet in the air. I was terrified when it first started to move. There were many American tourists there as well as people from all over Britain. Next we went to the{3D}film show. They showed a film of an elephant standing on its hind legs. It was about to get back on all fours and it looked so real that we thought it was going to crush us. I had a go on the Log Flumes, the roller-coaster, the Magic Carpet, the Dragon roller-coaster, and the Big Wheel. I then bought a giant sweet dummy and a book of Alton Towers. We went home at about 5 o'clock.
